SELECT h.send_code AS sendCode, h.stage_code AS stageCode, stg.stage_name_kor AS stageNameKor,
h.template_code AS templateCode, t.title AS templateTitle, t.content AS templateContent,
h.reservation_code AS reservationCode, h.stay_code AS stayCode,
p.property_code AS propertyCode, p.property_name AS propertyName,
h.channel AS channel, h.status AS status, h.scheduled_at AS scheduledAt, h.processing_at AS processingAt, h.sent_at AS sentAt, h.fail_reason AS failReason, h.external_message_id AS externalMessageId FROM message_send_history h JOIN message_journey_stage stg ON stg.stage_code = h.stage_code JOIN message_template t ON t.template_code = h.template_code AND t.stage_code = h.stage_code
/* reservation 기준으로 property 추출 (stay만 있는 경우도 커버) */ LEFT JOIN stay s ON s.stay_code = h.stay_code LEFT JOIN reservation r ON r.reservation_code = COALESCE(h.reservation_code, s.reservation_code) LEFT JOIN property p ON p.property_code = r.property_code
WHERE h.send_code = #{sendCode} LIMIT 1
